en: Evenly distribute your weight between both feet, finding a balanced stance.

Disperse your weight equally between your feet, grounding yourself firmly.
Balance your weight across both feet, creating a steady foundation.
Spread your weight evenly between your feet, maintaining a centred stance.
Place your weight equally on both feet, finding balance and stability.

Ensure your weight is equally balanced between both feet, creating steadiness.
Distribute your body weight equally between your feet, standing firm and stable.

Balance your body by evenly dispersing your weight between your feet.
Shift your weight so it rests equally on both feet, stabilising your position.

ru: Поднимите пятки так чтобы пятки оказались на высоте одного сантиметра от поверхности.
en: Raise the heels so that the heels are at one centimeter from the surface.
Quickly drop the heels to the surface.
